name: Cursed Moon
description:
The full moon has come out, and a curse has come upon town. No one knows where they came from, but a pack of werewolves have ascended on town, and are bringing more and more werewolves with them. As a member of Animal Control, you are fully experienced in situations like this, and have fought many werewolves yourself! Using the skills you have built over the years, get rid of the source, and send the werewolves back!

Controls

Arrow keys - Move

Jump - S

Punch - D

Throw Spoon - F

Return - Pause

Team

Programming: Jake LaCombe

Art: Guy Grossfeld, Jake LaCombe, and Colleenekat

Sound Effects: Noah Bumgardner

Narrative: Mercedes Hesselroth

Assets Used

Art from Chasersgaming

Music from Joth
